data.title: Presidential Campaigns & Elections Reference
data.meta_description: PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN & ELECTIONS OVERVIEWS & CHRONOLOGIES: 1880 By Bonnie K. Goodman, BA, MLIS OVERVIEW Election Year: 1880 Election Day Date: November 2, 1880 Winning Ticket: James A. Garfield (49, Church of Christ), Chester Arthur (51, Episcopalian), Republican 4,453,337 48.31% 214 58.0% Losing Ticket(s): Winfield Hancock (56, Baptist), William English (58,) Democratic 4,444,267 48.22% 155…
